name: AI Fixture: Site Publication Dialog Creation

input.prompt: Create a site publication dialog for publishing an onboarding site with TTL options including 1 month, 3 months, 1 year, indefinite, and custom date picker. The site is ready for publication and should include proper security controls.

output.content:
# Site Publication Configuration

Your onboarding site "Developer Onboarding" is ready for publication. Configure the access settings below:

## Publication Settings

**Site Access:** Public (anyone with the link)
**Security Level:** Read-only for anonymous users

## Time-to-Live (TTL) Options

Select how long the site should remain publicly accessible:

- ‚è∞ **1 Month** - Expires: 2025-07-18
- ‚è∞ **3 Months** - Expires: 2025-09-18  
- ‚è∞ **1 Year** - Expires: 2026-06-18
- ‚ôæÔ∏è **Indefinite** - No expiration
- üìÖ **Custom Date** - Choose specific date

## Generated Public URL

```
https://welcome-onboard.ru/s/abc123-dev-onboarding
```

## Security Features

‚úÖ Anonymous read-only access
‚úÖ No editing capabilities for public users
‚úÖ Automatic TTL enforcement
‚úÖ Owner retains full access
‚úÖ Revocation capability

**Recommendation:** For onboarding sites, 1-3 months TTL provides good balance between accessibility and security.
